name: Adventurer
fourPieceBonus: Opening chest regenerates 30% Max HP over 5s.

name: Archaic Petra
fourPieceBonus: Upon obtaining an Elemental Shard created through a Crystallize Reaction, all party members gain a 35% DMG Bonus for that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental DMG Bonus can be gained in this manner at any one time.

name: Berserker
fourPieceBonus: When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%.

name: Blizzard Strayer
fourPieceBonus: When a character attacks an enemy affected by Cryo, their CRIT Rate is increased by 20%. If the enemy is Frozen, CRIT Rate is increased by an additional 20%.

name: Bloodstained Chivalry
fourPieceBonus: After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s.

name: Brave Heart
fourPieceBonus: Increases DMG by 30% against enemies with more than 50% HP.

name: Crimson Witch of Flames
fourPieceBonus: Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Skill increases 2-Piece Set effects by 50% for 10s. Max 3 stacks.

name: Defender's Will
fourPieceBonus: Increases Elemental RES by 30% for each element present in the party.

name: Gambler
fourPieceBonus: Defeating an enemy has 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.

name: Gladiator's Finale
fourPieceBonus: If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%.

name: Heart of Depth
fourPieceBonus: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 30% for 15s.

name: Instructor
fourPieceBonus: After using Elemental Skill, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.

name: Lavawalker
fourPieceBonus: Increases DMG against enemies that are Burning or affected by Pyro by 35%.

name: Lucky Dog
fourPieceBonus: Picking up Mora restores 300 HP.

name: Maiden Beloved
fourPieceBonus: Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.

name: Martial Artist
twoPieceBonus: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 15%.
fourPieceBonus: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.

name: Noblesse Oblige
fourPieceBonus: Using an Elemental Burst increase all party memebers' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.

name: Pale Flame
fourPieceBonus: When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, ATK is increased by 9% for 7s. This effect stacks up to 2 times and can be triggered once every 0.3s. Once 2 stacks are reached, the 2-set effect is increased by 100%.

name: Resolution of Sojourner
fourPieceBonus: Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%.

name: Retracing Bolide
fourPieceBonus: While protected by a shield, gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG.

name: Scholar
fourPieceBonus: Gaining Energy gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occurs once every 3s.

name: Tenacity of the Millelith
fourPieceBonus: When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the ATK of all nearby party members is increased by 20% and their Shield Strength is increased by 30% for 3s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s. This effect can still be triggered even when the character who is using this artifact set is not on the field.

name: The Exile
fourPieceBonus: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for other party members every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack.

name: Thundering Fury
fourPieceBonus: Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged, and Superconduct DMG by 40%. Triggering such effects decreases Elemental Skill CD by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.

name: Thundersoother
fourPieceBonus: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Electro by 35%.

name: Tiny Miracle
fourPieceBonus: Incoming elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: Traveling Doctor
fourPieceBonus: Using Elemental Burst restores 20% HP.

name: Viridescent Venerer
fourPieceBonus: Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent's Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s.

name: Wanderer's Troupe
fourPieceBonus: Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or Bow.
